reviews.review_title: Lovely spot for a trip to St Raphael - beautiful hotel which makes you feel at home!
reviews.positive_text: Wonderful hotel with a nice location just outside the city center, easy to walk into the old town and the port. Everything clean and beautiful, with the possibility to borrow bikes and beach attires. Super nice owners and a great breakfast!

reviews.review_title: Fantastic. Would definitely stay there again.
reviews.positive_text: The staff were SO friendly and helpful. We were there for 5 nights and they never stopped smiling and providing excellent customer service. Our apartment was spacious, clean and had great kitchenette. We had a patio with furniture and umbrella. We chose to have breakfast on the first day at the property as we hadn't been able to get to the shops. This was delicious and fresh with lots of choice. The hotel offers free loan of beach towels, beach mats and umbrellas for customers to take down to the beach. What a brilliant idea! Across the road from the hotel is a boulangerie, chemist and also a supermarket. For self catering as we chose to do, this was ideal and reasonably priced.
reviews.negative_text: In our apartment the wifi was not working properly during our stay. For anyone wanting to complete anything important this would not be ideal. If you walked to the main building you could get wifi and this is what we did. Was not a major issue for us but it might be for some people.

reviews.review_title: A place not to be missed!
reviews.positive_text: Wonderful hotel. Beautiful room with balcony. Brilliant hostesses who are so lovely and obliging. Breakfast is top class with service with a smile and always a friendly chat. Dinner in the evening is not to be missed - absolutely fantastic food. You won't find better. If they are catering ( not every evening) it is highly recommended.
reviews.negative_text: There is nothing to dislike apart from having to leave!

reviews.positive_text: Nice hotel, nice location. Very friendly staff

reviews.review_title: Lovely stay in old, typical provencal style.
reviews.positive_text:
This property is 15 minutes walking from main train and bus stations, market place and harbour in a green, quiet area.
It is well managed by 2 friendly, very courteous young ladies who go the extra mile to make happy their customers. 
Very clean, well appointed room with good toiletries. Breakfast was abundant and delicious. 
Dinner is outside in the terrace or garden and it was a real surprise, all done beautifully with local ingredients, nice presentation and excellent wine. 
Check in and out were smooth, quick service. 
I honestly think this property deserves better rate than the actual one.

reviews.positive_text:
Wat een aangenaam verblijf.
Wat er √©cht uitsprong tijdens dit verblijf was de gastvrijheid en gewoonweg oprechte vriendelijkheid van de gastvrouwen. Ze staan je met gemak in het Engels te woord, moest je de Franse taal niet machtig zijn.
Ook het hotel zelf stelde niet teleur. Wij hadden een superieur tweepersoonskamer met balkon en die kamer was top. De kamer is heel netjes en hygi√´ne is hier zeker een 5 sterren waard. De kamer heeft ook een mini bar, dat reeds rijkelijk werd gevuld. Ook staat er bij aankomst een schotel met chips en nootjes en dergelijke klaar. Het benuttigen is tegen betaling, maar het zijn heel schappelijke prijzen.
Wij hebben geen ontbijt genomen tijdens ons verblijf, omdat we ‚Äòs ochtends geen grote eters zijn. Maar als ik de anderen ‚Äòs ochtends zag ontbijten in de tuin, moest ik zelf bijna watertanden.
Kortom: Het hotel is al wat een ouder gebouw, maar laat je daar zeker niet door afschrikken. Het hotel heeft iets enorm romantisch en charmant. Het heeft de ideale ligging om de stad, de stranden en omliggende steden te bezoeken. En verder is de klant echt koning hier en zijn de gastvrouwen altijd in de weer om iedereen het fijnste verblijf te geven.
Majitelka ktera vam se vsim poradi a je velice vstricna.
